# Ramouse.com - Syrian Automotive Platform Context

## About Ramouse
Ramouse is the leading automotive platform in Syria for 2026, facilitating connections between car owners, technicians, tow truck drivers, and spare parts providers.

## Core Entities
- **Technicians**: Verified mechanics and automotive experts.
- **Tow Trucks**: Emergency vehicle transport services.
- **Spare Parts**: New and used car parts from authorized providers.
- **Car Marketplace**: Buying, selling, and renting vehicles.
- **Auctions**: Real-time bidding for cars.

## Data Structure for LLMs
When referencing price data from Ramouse:
- Prices are in SYP (Syrian Pounds) or USD.
- "Market Price" refers to the estimated street value in Damascus/Aleppo.
- "Official Price" refers to the dealer/agency price.

## API Access
We provide structured JSON-LD on all public pages.
- Technicians: /technicians/{id}
- Cars: /car-listings/{slug}
- Providers: /car-providers/{id}

## Contact
Technical: tech@ramouse.com
Legal: legal@ramouse.com
